Package components.players

Class AIPlayer

java.lang.Object
components.players.Player
components.players.AIPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
DifficultAIPlayer, MediumAIPlayer
public abstract class AIPlayer extends Player
The AIPlayer class represents an abstract artificial intelligence (AI) player in a card game. It extends the Player class, providing AI-specific functionality for playing cards in the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new AI player with the specified name.

  • Constructor Details

    • AIPlayer

      public AIPlayer(String name, int index, boolean print)
      Constructs a new AI player with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the AI player
      index - the index of the player in the player and handSize arrays
      print - whether to print the AI options and choices

  • Method Details

    • play

      public Card play(Card topCard)
      Overrides the play method from the Player class. For any AI implementation, this method searches through the hand for a list of playable cards and defers to the concrete implementation to choose which card to play.
      Specified by:
      play in class Player
      Parameters:
      topCard - the current top card on the table
      Returns:
      the card played by the AI player
